title: Giancarlo Stanton Earns Record $325 Million Contract With Marlins
teaser: The outfielder's deal goes a long way toward ingratiating owner Jeffrey Loria into the hearts of fans. Robert Siegel talks to Manny Navarro, a sports reporter for the The Miami Herald.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
